game.name: Rising Army
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A strategy camp sim game where you manage and command your army, training each individual troop and upgrading your camp. Satisfy your King by completing missions and epic battles against enemies. Lead your Lord to legend!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A strategy camp sim game where you manage and command your army, training each individual troop and upgrading your camp. Satisfy your King by completing missions and epic battles against enemies. Lead your Lord to legend!
